DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy Diamel administration treatment Polycystic Ovary Syndrome . The duration double-blind placebo control phase 3 clinical trial 24 week .
DOC.criteria: Two follow criterion : Oligo Anovulation Polycystic Ovary diagnose ultrasound technique Clinical sign Hyperandrogenism Signed inform consent Personal history cause hyperandrogenism : Hyperprolactinemia , suprarenal tumor , ovary tumor , suprarenal hyperplasia , hypercortisolism . Patients experimental treatment Treatment ovulation inducer and/or insulin sensitizer within 60 day treatment Treatment vitamin within 7 day treatment Treatment dietary supplement within 60 day treatment Noncompensated intercurrent disease : diabetes mellitus , thyroid disease , hypertension
